name: Visiting Celebrity
description: A celebrity from another nation or even a distant land visits one of your settlements, causing a sudden influx of notoriety, visitors, and lavish spending. The GM determines the nature of the visiting celebrity.

criticalSuccess.msg: The visit is a rousing success. Not only are your citizens delighted by the visitor, but the visitor is quite taken with your kingdom and leaves you with a parting gift. Choose two of the following: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Gain 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="luxuries" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Gain 1d6 Luxuries</button>, or <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Lose 1d6 Unrest</button>

success.msg: The visit is a success. Not only are your citizens delighted by the visitor, but the visitor is quite taken with your kingdom and leaves you with a parting gift. Choose one of the following: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Gain 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="luxuries" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Gain 1d6 Luxuries</button>, or <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Lose 1d6 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: The visitor has an agreeable if pedestrian visit. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Lose 1 Unrest</button>

criticalFailure.msg: The visitor leaves unimpressed and spreads reports of their unpleasant visit abroad. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Unrest</button>.
